sentences.sContent: The adorable inchworm is really the caterpillar of the geometer moth.
sentences.sContent_eng: The adorable inchworm is really the caterpillar of the geometer moth.
sentences.sCn: 可爱的尺蠖就是尺蠖毛虫。

sentences.sContent: If you have ever experienced the childlike delight of discovering an inchworm, you know how fun they are to watch.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you have ever experienced the childlike delight of discovering an inchworm, you know how fun they are to watch.
sentences.sCn: 如果你有过看到尺蠖露出孩子般灿烂笑脸的经历，你就知道观察尺蠖是多么有趣。

sentences.sContent: And with the inchworm, he flew to where other birds needed to be measured.
sentences.sContent_eng: And with the inchworm, he flew to where other birds needed to be measured.
sentences.sCn: 知更鸟带著尺蠖飞到其他鸟需要被测量的地方。
